description: Observation code identifying the asset feature or condition this rule applies to.
Human-readable description of the observation code.
Category grouping the observation for scoring and reporting.
Severity degree associated with the observation, typically an ordinal scale (e.g., 0â€“5).
Numeric weight applied to the observation/degree in condition score calculations.
Expression or rule defining how to score or evaluate the observation and degree.
User or system that created the record.
Date and time the record was created.
User or system that last updated the record.
Date and time of the most recent update.
